An abstract base class for making Selectors that are based only on the row key

Method Detail

handleKeyValue

public final Filter.ReturnCode handleKeyValue(KeyValue keyValue)
Determine what to do with the key/value. If Selector.includeRow(byte[], int, int) returned false, then this method will not even be called. Therefore, the only reasonable values to return are INCLUDE, SKIP, NEXT_COL.

Always indicates that the key/value should be included, because the real logic will be implemented in Selector.includeRow(byte[], int, int) to determine if the row should be included or not.

Specified by:
handleKeyValue in interface Selector
Parameters:
keyValue - the KeyValue in question
See Also:
Filter.ReturnCode, Filter.filterKeyValue(KeyValue)
